vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παρα-θήκη, ἡ,
anything entrusted to one. deposit, [LXX+5th c.BC+]; of persons, hostage, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
deposit, thing entrusted to
a deposit, a thing committed to one's charge, a trust, 1Tim. 6:20; 2Tim. 1:12; 2Tim. 1:14*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: depósito, algo que ha sido confiado a su cuidado
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tiền đặt cọc; điều ủy thác; gửi tiền
